doc.field: Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Subseries II: National and International Cites
Subseries II: National and International Cites

This subseries of lantern slides depicts all types of architecture from all over the world including bridges, fountains, parks, museums, and villas. Although a few of Gilbert's projects are represented in this subseries (St. Louis Art Museum, Belle Isle Bridge) most of the slides are not of his work. The slides represent architecture in the United States as well as in France, Italy, England, Holland, Spain, Japan, and Germany.
